docs.text:
Codelists


These codelists define standard terms that can be shared.


Missed collection reasons





  
ID

  
Name

  
Description






  
1

  
Not presented

  
The containers is not presented at the curbside.






  
2

  
Contaminated

  
The contents of the container is contaminated with waste not suitable for that collection.






  
3

  
Too heavy

  
The container contents is too heavy for safe collection.
